parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.
A drinking cup, the contents of the cup; fig: the portion which God allots.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To divide up into parts, break up; I distribute. From dia and merizo; to partition thoroughly.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
